page.title: 01KILKHAMPTON TODAY
page.content: {Kilkhampton}is a busy village on the main road between{Bideford}and{Bude.} In the centre of the village is a {square}where you will find a Post Office, a Coffee House and several shops. The{church}of St. James attracts many visitors as it is very old and quite historical. There is also a Methodist Chapel,two public houses,the London Inn,the New Inn and a primary school,as well as many cottages and houses still as they were originally built. North Cornwall Tractors sells most equipment for farming,gardening and sports.Walkeys shop was opened in 1807 and the family has owned it for 178 years.It used to be a grocers but now it's a drapers shop. In the old square,300 year old cottages have been converted into shop premises.
